# Refactor Helper Prompt

Refactor this code while:

## Preserving
- [ ] Existing functionality
- [ ] Test compatibility
- [ ] API contracts
- [ ] Data structures

## Improving
- [ ] Code readability
- [ ] Performance
- [ ] Maintainability
- [ ] Type safety

## Testing
- [ ] Run tests before
- [ ] Run tests after
- [ ] Add missing tests
- [ ] Update documentation
